glsa.title: tftp-hpa: Remote buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability was found in tftp-hpa, which leads to remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: tftp-hpa is the port of the OpenBSD TFTP server.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in tftp-hpa. Please review the CVE identifier referenced below for details.

impact.p: The vulnerability might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All tftp-hpa users should upgrade to the latest version:
